channel.title: cyborgs on Nikki Stevens

item.title: Cyborg making
item.description: Every Friday, my cohort and I attend HSD602, the second half of our year-long seminar on the foundations of STS. Each week, a different student leads class and has about an hour to decide what the class will do and how we’ll discuss this week’s readings.
